references: Shallit, Jeffrey; Predictable regular continued cotangent expansions. J. Res. Nat. Bur. Standards Sect. B 80B (1976), no. 2, 285-290.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Recurrence: a(n+1)=a(n)^3+3a(n) and a(0)=3 a(n)=Round[(3/2 + Sqrt[13]/2)^(3^(n - 1))] [From _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 03 2008]
mathematica: Contribution from _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 03 2008: (Start)a = {}; k = 3; Do[AppendTo[a, k]; k = k^3 + 3 k, {n, 1, 6}]; aorTable[Round[N[(3/2 + Sqrt[13]/2)^(3^(n - 1)), 1000]], {n, 1, 8}] (*Artur Jasinski*) (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
